snippet: Matt Kenseth, after two rain delays that totaled 6 hours 30 minutes, passed teammate Kyle Busch on a restart with 27 laps to go in the opening race of the Chase for the Sprint Cup championship.
abstract: Matt Kenseth wins opening race of the Chase for the Sprint Cup championship; Joey Logano becomes first champion driver out of 10-race playoff after dropping out when his engine quit with 91 laps remaining.
lead_paragraph: Matt Kenseth, after two rain delays that totaled 6 hours 30 minutes, passed teammate Kyle Busch on a restart with 27 laps to go in the opening race of the Chase for the Sprint Cup championship.

headline.main: Kenseth, After Two Rain Delays, Wins Opening Chase Race
headline.print_headline: Logano Drops Out of Chase Race
